name: ASCII dungeon adventure
description:
LOOK HERE, GUYS

OH MY GOD

IT IS SUPER-COOL-ASCII-DUNGEON-ADVENTURE

***

I'm too lazy to write a description. Well... There is dungeons... Adventures.. ASCII... Isn't that enough to download that AWESOME game FOR FREE?

By the way, there is released free source code and OST (2 in 1), you can download them too.

And yeah, I am really hardcore programmer, so if I do ASCII-games, I do them in Batch (CMD). And I did that game there too.

Awesome sh1t. You just must download it.
